system.description:
Your reliance on good fortune opens you up to new encounters and the benefits thereof.

Your reputation as a gambler precedes you, and there are members of any community you travel to that find your gambling ways to be a dangerous influence, particularly on the younger generations. Whenever you use the Gather Information downtime activity you can roll as many of your risk dice each week as you like.

  • Even numbers on your dice reduce the gold cost by their value.

  • Odd numbers increase the gold cost by 1.
